parameters.name: MaxResults
parameters.description:
The maximum number of entries to return for a single request.

Valid values: 1 to 100. Default value: 10.

parameters.name: NextToken
parameters.description: The token that is used to start the next query.

parameters.name: ResourceType
parameters.description:
The resource type.

The value Account indicates the members of the resource directory.

parameters.name: TagKey
parameters.description: The tag key. This parameter specifies a filter condition for the query.

parameters.name: ValueFilter
parameters.description: The tag value for a fuzzy query.
